securitygame

Class DefenderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardPickup.DefenderHelper

  • public class DefenderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Axillary class for creating and parsing defence files. Defender will use the three parameter constructor and combination of strengthen(), firewall, and honeypot() to generate defence file. Have Defender remember to call close() when finished for safety. Game Master will use the two parameter constructor for parsing original network and defence file to generate new network. Actions deemed invalid will be charged the Parameters.INVALID_RATE value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DefenderHelper(Network network, java.lang.String graphFile, java.lang.String defenderName)
      Constructor used by Defender to initialize defence file and keep track of network changes.
      DefenderHelper(java.lang.String defenderName, java.lang.String graphFile)
      Constructor used by GameMaster to create new secured graph based on Defender's defence actions.

      • DefenderHelper

        public DefenderHelper(Network network,
              java.lang.String graphFile,
              java.lang.String defenderName)
        Constructor used by Defender to initialize defence file and keep track of network changes.
        Parameters:
        network - Graph being secured given a budget
        graphFile - Contains original name of graph i.e. "1" for 1.graph
        defenderName - Name of defender will be prepended to defence file i.e. "tower" for tower-1.defence

      • DefenderHelper

        public DefenderHelper(java.lang.String defenderName,
              java.lang.String graphFile)
        Constructor used by GameMaster to create new secured graph based on Defender's defence actions.
        Parameters:
        defenderName - Name of defender prepended to defence file i.e. "tower" for tower-1.defence
        graphFile - Contains original name of graph i.e. "1" for 1.graph

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        Defender should call this method when done adding actions.

      • invalid

        public void invalid()
        Action has been deemed invalid

      • strengthen

        public void strengthen(int id)
        Adds 1 to a node security value if the node is not public or not already at maximum security.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the node being strengthened

      • firewall

        public void firewall(int id1,
            int id2)
        Removes the edge between two nodes. Will not remove if doing so will isolate a node. Will not remove if there is no edge to remove.
        Parameters:
        id1 - First node's id
        id2 - Second node's id

      • honeypot

        public void honeypot(int sv,
            int pv,
            int[] newNeighbors)
        Adds a honeypot node to the graph if possible. Otherwise charges an invalid.
        Parameters:
        sv - Security Value for the honeypot
        pv - Point Value for the honeypot
        newNeighbors - Array of Node ID's specifying which nodes to connect the honeypot to
